Narvar Belvrost was a fabled member of the Belvrost clan of mages. Their tale was retold as of the late 14 century DR.
They were told to have found the "Lake Where Dragons Sleep" four centuries prior to , somewhere under Gulthmere.How exactly this legend came to be is unclear, as the clan was supposedly created through the machinations of Maxiladanarr Torstren sometime after . It is very likely that Narvar Belvrost was intended to be read as a fabrication.
